title: Spack can't find correct version of libstdc++ when installing STAT
body:
Hi,

I am trying to build STAT with spack and I am getting an issue when Spack tries to build cmake (see log below).

I have installed GCC-6.3.0, because with a more recent version of GCC there are some issues with flex.
Now the problem seems to be related to libstdc++, it looks like spack uses the systems one rather then the one that comes with my version of gcc.

Any idea how to fix this?
Thanks.
Simone
